author: Matt Bassil
description:
When is the MTG Spiderman release date? Marvel Spiderman is the second Universes Beyond set coming out in 2025, and the first in what we expect to be several Marvel Magic: The Gathering releases over the next couple of years. The wallcrawling, webslinging hero will be joined by plenty of allies fromacross the Spiderverse, to battle against one of the best rogue’s galleries in the entire superhero genre.

Continue reading MTG Spider-Man release date, card spoilers, and news
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: MTG Spider-Man release date, card spoilers, and news

author: Alex Evans
description:
To put things mildly, there are a lot of Warhammer 40k factions, races, and armies warring across the grimdark far future of Games Workshop’s flagship sci-fi wargame. Over 20 of them, in fact, and that’s only counting the ‘main’ 40k armies that get their own fully fledged codex rulebooks every edition. Here we'll break down the core Warhammer 40k factions list, with details about each army - including the Emperor's Children, brand new for 2025.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k factions - all 40k armies and races explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer 40k factions - all 40k armies and races explained

author: Mollie Russell
description:
A new Humble Bundle offers a steep discount on 3D printing files is perfect for DnD players hunting for new minis. $484 worth of printable miniatures is available for just $25 – around 6% of their original price. The bundle includes a small army of humanoid figures that could serve as a Dungeons and Dragons character or NPC, as well as plenty of handy bits of fantasy terrain.

Continue reading Grab 94% off this $484 bundle of 3D printer minis, perfect for DnD
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Grab 94% off this $484 bundle of 3D printer minis, perfect for DnD

author: Alex Evans
description:
Since online miniature painting impresario Duncan 'Two Thin Coats' Rhodes left Games Workshop in 2019, Rhodes has founded an online painting academy and launched an entire custom paint range. But, in a live video AMA in Wargamer's Discord (which you can listen to in full below) he tells us the one thing he really wishes he'd still been at GW for: the rebirth of Warhammer The Old World.

Continue reading Painting star Duncan Rhodes wishes he'd been at GW for Warhammer The Old World
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Warhammer: The Old World latest news, Warhammer The Old World rules, Warhammer The Old World factions
title: Painting star Duncan Rhodes wishes he'd been at GW for Warhammer The Old World

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Diffusion Sliver seems to have undergone a huge price spike very quickly. According to MTG Goldfish’s price tracker, this card was selling for just $2 a couple of days ago, but since then it has skyrocketed up to $12.40.

A quick caveat, I’m not seeing this card going for anything like that much on TCGPlayer, so it’s possible this is a glitch in the matrix, but at any rate it definitely seems to be on the uptick.

Continue reading This Sliver MTG card has seen a sudden 500% price spike
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: This Sliver MTG card has seen a sudden 500% price spike

author: Matt Bassil
description:
How many Pokémon cards are there? The trading card game has been running since 1999, with hundreds of new Pokémon cards added each year, so the number is up in the thousands. In fact, not counting promos or Japanese language cards, there are over 17,000 Pokémon cards from main and special set releases right now - with plenty more coming all the time.

Continue reading How many Pokémon cards are there in 2025?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: How many Pokémon cards are there in 2025?

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Macaraccoon, a board game that’s so cute it hurts my eyes, began crowdfunding on Kickstarter on September 2. This is an Overcooked-style baking competition that promises to be “a delicious baking board game that keeps everyone on their toe-beans”.

Continue reading This Overcooked style board game is so adorable, I feel physically sick
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: This Overcooked style board game is so adorable, I feel physically sick

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Fancy winning an action figure that’s 21 inches tall and weighs as much as a human infant? Good news! Games Workshop is running a prize draw this September, with a JoyToy action figure of a Warhammer 40k Imperial Knight Paladin as the grand prize - and all you have to do is sign up to the Warhammer newsletter to be in with a chance of winning.

Continue reading Win a free, $699 JoyToy Imperial Knight in Warhammer 40k's new prize draw
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Win a free, $699 JoyToy Imperial Knight in Warhammer 40k's new prize draw

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The next Pokémon TCG release, Phantasmal Flames, has been revealed, and preorders are expected to open up any day now. The set comes just one month after the first set of the Mega Evolution block, dropping on November 14.

Continue reading Pokémon TCG Phantasmal Flames set revealed, preorders incoming
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Pokémon TCG Phantasmal Flames set revealed, preorders incoming

author: Timothy Linward
description:
One of the great things about Star Wars Legion - aside from the fact it’s a great miniature wargame - is the huge range of models it has made available for miniature builders and painters to create custom dioramas. Legion fan Mo (who prefers not to give a surname) estimates he has spent “upwards of 100 hours” creating this unique trench warfare diorama: we asked him how this project came to be.

Continue reading Star Wars Legion fan spends 100 hours+ crafting incredible Clone Wars diorama
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legion - release dates roadmap, Star Wars Shatterpoint review
title: Star Wars Legion fan spends 100 hours+ crafting incredible Clone Wars diorama
